ch0259_00_sania/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m getting excited thinking about how many sync
pairs we’ll meet up with today!
ch0259_00_sania/7101_0701_01_10:
Partner Pokémon always come ’round looking for
attention when you’re trying to read a book, don’t
they. You know what I mean...right?
ch0259_00_sania/7101_0701_02_10:
Now that I think about it, I guess it only happens
when I’ve had my head in a book for so long that
I’ve forgotten to eat...
ch0259_00_sania/7102_0701_01_10:
Are you a “thinking Trainer” or a “feeling
Trainer?”
ch0259_00_sania/7102_0701_02_10:
A thinking Trainer does careful research, while a
feeling Trainer trusts their instincts.
ch0259_00_sania/7102_0701_03_10:
I’m the type to rely on my knowledge in a
Pokémon battle, but y’know, in the end, I think the
Trainer that’s having the most fun wins.
ch0259_00_sania/7102_0701_04_10:
So I guess at the end of the day, we’re all just
“fun-loving Trainers!”
ch0259_00_sania/7103_0701_01_10:
When I get really into my research, I don’t have a
single moment to spare on fashion or makeup.
ch0259_00_sania/7103_0701_02_10:
My friend Nessa is a Gym Leader AND a model.
Honestly, I don’t know how she does it.
ch0259_00_sania/7104_0701_01_10:
Is there anyone that you look up to? Personally,
I really look up to my gran.
ch0259_00_sania/7104_0701_02_10:
Her name’s Professor Magnolia, and she was the
first one to research the Dynamax phenomenon.
ch0259_00_sania/7104_0701_03_10:
The best way I can repay my gran for all she’s
done is by becoming an amazing professor myself!
ch0259_00_sania/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. What do you
think about people whose rooms are a mess?
ch0259_00_sania/7105_0701_02_10:
I’ve been so into reading lately, and before I
realized it... Ugh, I’ve really got to tidy up!
ch0259_00_sania/1701_0701_01_10:
Since you’ve been working so hard, here’s a
present!
ch0259_00_sania/1701_0702_01_10: I thought you might like it. Use it carefully!
ch0259_00_sania/2501_0701_01_10:
In the Galar region, we have something called the
Gym Challenge. Trainers go around and try to
collect badges from eight Gyms.
ch0259_00_sania/2501_0701_02_10:
I did the challenge, too, and I did well at first, but
I just couldn’t beat the young man I was traveling
around with. Then I gave up on being a Trainer.
ch0259_00_sania/2501_0701_03_10:
I’ve got no regrets. That’s the whole reason I
decided to become a researcher.
ch0259_00_sania/2501_0701_04_10:
But I often wonder what would’ve happened if I’d
just stuck with it a bit longer.
ch0259_00_sania/2501_0702_01_10:
Now I feel like I want to get back into doing
Pokémon battles again.
ch0259_00_sania/2501_0702_02_10:
I was really inspired after seeing how much fun
you have when you battle!
ch0259_00_sania/2511_0701_01_10:
In Galar and in other regions, there are Legendary
Pokémon. Tales about them have been passed
down from ancient times.
ch0259_00_sania/2511_0701_02_10:
So far, no Legendary Pokémon have originated
from Pasio.
ch0259_00_sania/2511_0701_03_10:
But it’s an island that will build up a rich history
and be loved by many people, so it’s only a
matter of time!
ch0259_00_sania/2511_0701_04_10:
I hope that the moment a new Legendary
Pokémon appears on Pasio, I’ll be here to
witness it firsthand!
ch0259_00_sania/2511_0702_01_10:
For now, I can spend my time doing extensive
research on you!
ch0259_00_sania/2511_0702_02_10:
Oh, calm down! I just mean that I’ll go along and
battle together with you until I’ve figured out
your secrets!
ch0259_00_sania/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Let’s give it our all out there today!
And no matter what, stay positive!
ch0259_00_sania/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey! Don’t think I didn’t see you dozing off
earlier, sleepyhead. Come on, the day’s just
getting started!
ch0259_00_sania/3005_0701_01_10:
Are you still planning on running around even
after dark? Well, just watch your step, all right?
Stay sharp!
